description:
In the upcoming match between Aurora and Nigma Galaxy in the DreamLeague Division 2 Playoffs, scheduled for February 12 at 12:45PM ET:

This market is about the total kills in Game 2.

This market will resolve to "Over" if the total kills in Game 2 is 44 or more. Otherwise, it will resolve to "Under".

If the match is canceled (not played at all) or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If Game 2 is never played due to forfeit, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If Game 2 begins but is not completed, this market will resolve to 50-50.

If Game 2 is remade, resolution will be based on the total kills in the remade game only.

events.description:
This market refers to the Dota 2 match between Aurora and Nigma Galaxy in the DreamLeague Division 2 Playoffs, scheduled for February 12 at 12:30PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Aurora" if Aurora win the match against Nigma Galaxy.

This market will resolve to "Nigma Galaxy" if Nigma Galaxy win the match against Aurora.

If the match is canceled (not played at all), ends in a tie, or is delayed beyond 7 days from the scheduled date without a winner determined, this market will resolve to 50-50. 

If the match begins but is not completed, and one team wins due to the opponent's forfeiture, disqualification, or walkover, this market will resolve to the team who wins. 

If the match ends in a forfeit, disqualification, or walkover (team withdraws before the start and the other wins automatically), this market will resolve to 50-50. 

The resolution source for this market will be official information from https://www.liquipedia.net/dota2/Main_Page.
events.title: Dota 2: Aurora vs Nigma Galaxy (BO5) - DreamLeague Division 2 Playoffs

question: Total Kills Over/Under 43.5 in Game 2?
